jrtr.gldeferredrenderer

Class Matrix4fUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.Matrix4fUtils

  • public class Matrix4fUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for doing matrix operations to prevent boiler plate code.
    Author:
    Heinrich Reich
